name: Necromedic
description:
You are a powerful Necromancer. Your lair was besieged by the king's forces and you were taken prisoner. In order to avoid losing your head in an untimely manner, you have agreed to serve the king.

Armed with a manual of necromancy, several tools and a knowledge of magic you can use your abilities to bring the king's dead subjects back to life. Do so for long enough, and you might yet walk free one day.

An entry for the SA Game Jam

Emile Hay (@LaserLemon) Programming & UI Art
Daniel Esterhuizen (@Gnoblar_agency) - Programming & Design
Wesley Smith (@The_Enemy) - Programming & 3D Art
Jesse Smith (@SeaOtter) - Writing & Environment

Categories Your Team is Eligible for
Art, Technical Excellence, Narrative, Overall. 

Team contains an SA resident living in Copenhagen.

Assets Used

  • Polygon Fantasy Characters
  • Low Poly Dungeon
  • Ultimate Game Music Collection
  • Skybox ad-on
  • First Person Controller
  • Free Sound Effects
